title: KINGDOM HOLINESS MANNER
memoryVerse: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience-2Tim.3:10
meaning: The Characters, ways or behaviour of a person in the Kingdom of God. The way he lives, do things and render services to God and man
meaning_list: God is Holy means God has a Holy nature; those in his kingdom must possess the same life of holiness. 1Pet.1:15-16, Lev.11:44,19:2,20:7
The manner of God is holiness, goodness, righteousness, purity, sanctification. 2King.17:26-27,33-34
Elisha was a holy man of God no doubt about it – 2King.4:9 but His holiness couldn’t take the insult from the forty two children, he killed them
Holiness is a life giver and not a killer – Jn.10:10
How long can your holiness tolerate when you are provoked?
How long can your patience bear when you are provoked?
How long can your long suffering bear when you are provoked?
How long can your love bear when you are provoked?
How long can your faith bear when you are provoked?
How long can your righteousness bear when you are provoked e.t.c.

content.header: 1Sam.10:25 - The manner of God’s kingdom is holy, holy, holy. Holiness in the spirit, Holiness in the soul and Holiness in the flesh.
The manner of God’s Kingdom is different from the manner of the kingdom of the world.

title: KINGDOM HOLINESS MANNER
memoryVerse: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience-2Tim.3:10
meaning: The Characters, ways or behaviour of a person in the Kingdom of God. The way he lives, do things and render services to God and man

body.header: THE MANNER OF THE KINGDOM OF THE WORLD OR SATAN

content.header: Egyptian manner – Is.10:24
list: Oppression, suffering and putting people in bondage is their manner.
Their manner is to serve idols

content.header: The manner of men – Rom.6:19
list: Lust, fighting, killing, lustful desire are the manner of men – James 4:1-2

content.header: Gentiles manner – Gal.2:14-15
list: Sin, fornication, adultery, lying are manner of the gentiles – Jude 1:7

content.header: The manner of the beast and creeping things. Levit.11:44
Iniquity manner – Is.14:12-15
list: The evil you conceive in your heart is iniquity
The wicked desire in your heart against your brother is iniquity and this is the manner of the world. – Matt.7:23

title: KINGDOM HOLINESS MANNER
memoryVerse: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience-2Tim.3:10
meaning: The Characters, ways or behaviour of a person in the Kingdom of God. The way he lives, do things and render services to God and man

content.header: Heb.11:1 – Faith is a substance of things hope for on earth e. g riches, wealth, healing, land, buildings, cars etc
Holiness is a substance of God hope for – e. g salvation, mercy, safety, love, kingdom of heaven, righteousness etc.
We must seek first the kingdom of God, righteousness and all these things shall be added unto us – Matt.6:33
list: When we seek first the holiness of God then all these things that come through faith shall be added to us.

content.header: Is.6:13 – When everything is gone what shall be remaining is the holy seed  – 2Tim.2:19

body.header: SCHOOL OF HOLINESS

content.header: GILGAL -  Gilgal was a training school for Kingdom manners.
list: Elisha was also trained in Gilgal – 2King 2:1, 4:38

As a child of the Kingdom, don’t run away from training because before God will make you, you must pass through training and re-training to bring out that nature of God in you. Present yourself always in Gilgal
Gilgal represents the church of the living God, where you learn about God’s Holiness and righteousness.

content.header: Holy Scripture: 2Tim.3:15
list: the word of God is a school to make you holy when you give attention to it, by reading, meditating and observing to do all that is written therein.

content.header: Obedience is a school of holiness
list: Obedience to the will of God
Obedience to instruction of God
Obedience to counsel of God

content.header: Righteousness is a school of holiness:
list: Living right, doing the right things and walking in the will of God

title: KINGDOM HOLINESS MANNER
memoryVerse: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience-2Tim.3:10
meaning: The Characters, ways or behaviour of a person in the Kingdom of God. The way he lives, do things and render services to God and man

body.header: SCHOOL OF HOLINESS (Continuation)

content.header: Fear of God is a school of holiness – 2Corin.7:1
Sanctification is a school of holiness – Lev.11:44
list: Cleanse yourself from the old ways, allow old things to pass away, for the newness of God to spring up – (except a corn fall to the earth and die it will be alone)
Make your heart pure and clean.

body.header: GOD’S KINGDOM MANNER OF HOLINESS – 2Tim.3:10

content.header: Holy conversation – 1Pet.1:15-16
list: Conversation that is edifying is holy – 2Pet.3:11
A godly conversation and not a corrupt conversation.

content.header: Prayer is the manner of God’s kingdom – Matt. 6:9
list: Jesus taught his disciples the Kingdom manner of prayer
It is not every prayer God will answer except prayer done according to His manner and not other manner. Matt.6:5-9

content.header: Love is the manner of God’s holiness – 1Jn.3:1
list: Love is the manner of God
God is love and Love is God
Where is your Love for souls?
Where is your love to save?
Where is your love to help?
Love speak no evil
Love covers sin – Pro.10:12

title: KINGDOM HOLINESS MANNER
memoryVerse: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience-2Tim.3:10
meaning: The Characters, ways or behaviour of a person in the Kingdom of God. The way he lives, do things and render services to God and man

body.header: GOD’S KINGDOM MANNER OF HOLINESS (Continuation)

content.header: Peace is the manner of God’s Kingdom Matt.5:9
list: The life of God’s kingdom is peace that is why every child of God must do everything possible to keep his peace and leave with peace with others
A child of the Kingdom will do all things to reconcile people back to the way of peace because the way of God is the way of peace – Jn.14:27,16:33, Jn.20:21

content.header: Long suffering is the manner of God’s Kingdom – Num. 14:18–20
list: How long can you endure?
How long can your holiness bear when you are provoked?

How long can your holiness tolerate when you are provoked?
Example: Elisha couldn’t tolerate forty two children but killed them – 2king 2:23-24
When you are in the kingdom of God and refuse to train your children in the manner of the Kingdom of God you are killing the children.
When a minister of the kingdom of God don’t care about the children’s ministry, that minister is killing the children.

So repent from killing the children.
Example: Moses holy manner was provoked and he couldn’t bear it and for that act he didn’t enter the earthly  Promised Land of Canaan – Num.20:8-12

content.header: 6. Manner of God’s Kingdom offering, Gift and presentation of alms. Levit.9:16
list: Do you know the manner of offering God requires from you as a child of the kingdom
How do you present your alms of kindness to others as a child of God’s Kingdom? – Matt.6:1-4

title: KINGDOM HOLINESS MANNER
memoryVerse: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience-2Tim.3:10
meaning: The Characters, ways or behaviour of a person in the Kingdom of God. The way he lives, do things and render services to God and man

body.header: GOD’S KINGDOM MANNER OF HOLINESS (Continuation)

content.header: Fasting is the manner of God’s kingdom: Matt.4:1-2, Matt.6:6-18, Matt.17:21
list: When last did you wait on God in fasting
When you fast which kind of countenance do you put on?

content.header: Kingdom holiness manner of burial – Jn.19:40
list: There is a manner of Christian burial different from the manner of the world.

content.header: Godly sorrow is God’s Kingdom manner of holiness: 2Corin.7:9-10
list: Sorrow that brings repentance
Sorrow that takes you back to God’s way

Sorrow that makes you realize your wrong and mistake
We don’t sorrow like those who have no hope – 1Thess.4:13

content.header: God’s Kingdom tree of life has twelve manner of fruits – Rev.22:2
list: This is the fruit of the Spirit of God – Eph.5:9, plus the Father, Son, Holy Ghost making a total of twelve.

content.header: Meekness and humility is the manner of God’s Kingdom – Matt.21:5 Ps.25:9, Ps.147:6, Is.29:19, Matt.5:5

title: KINGDOM HOLINESS MANNER
memoryVerse: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience-2Tim.3:10
meaning: The Characters, ways or behaviour of a person in the Kingdom of God. The way he lives, do things and render services to God and man

body.header: GOD’S KINGDOM MANNER OF HOLINESS (Continuation)

content.header: Truth is the manner of God’s holiness – 2Jn.1:1-4, Jn. 4:24, Prov.23:23, 1Sam.12:24, 1Corin.13:6, Pro.8:7 Ps.26:1-3, Gal 5:7,  2Corin.13:8
Righteousness is the manner of God’s holiness – Eph.4:24, Phil.3:9 1Jn.3:7, Micah.6:5 Matt.3:15,5:20,6:33, 2Corin.5:21,6:7
Faith is the manner of God’s holiness
Godliness is the manner of holiness – 1Tim.6:11

body.header: MANNER OF THE KINGDOM OF THE WORLD OR SATAN

content.header: Corruption – Lev.22:25, Gal.6:8, 2Pet.2:19
Killing – Jn.10:10
Stealing – Jn.10:10
Destruction – Jn.10:10

title: KINGDOM HOLINESS MANNER
memoryVerse: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience-2Tim.3:10
meaning: The Characters, ways or behaviour of a person in the Kingdom of God. The way he lives, do things and render services to God and man

body.header: OTHER MANNER OF THE KINGDOM OF THE WORLD OR SATAN (Continuation)

content.header: Ungodliness – Jude1:4
Unrighteousness - Jer.22:13, Rom.1:29
Hatred – Eze.35: 5
Lust – Pro. 6:25, James 1:15
Lies – Jer.14:14-15, Jer.9:3

title: KINGDOM HOLINESS MANNER
memoryVerse: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience-2Tim.3:10
meaning: The Characters, ways or behaviour of a person in the Kingdom of God. The way he lives, do things and render services to God and man

body.header:
THE COMPONENTS OF HOLINESS (INGREDIENTS OF HOLINESS)
[When you have and possess holiness these things shall be with you.]

content.header: The Holy Father reside in you – 1Jn.4:4
list: The Holy Father resides in you.

content.header: The holy word of God resides in you, - Luke 3:2
list: The word is Christ Jesus.
The word will come and dwell in you.

content.header: The Holy Spirit resides in you – 2Tim.1:14, James 4:5, 1Corin.3:16
list: The Holy Spirit resides and dwell in you and you become his temple.

content.header: The truth always reside in you – Zach.8:3
list: You walk in the truth.
You live in the truth and you will be called the child of truth.

content.header: The righteousness of God resides in you – Dan.9:14, 1Jn.3:7
The peace of God dwells in you – Jn.14:27
list: The peace of the Lord will dwell in you.

content.header: The justness of God dwells  in you – Jn.5:30
list: You are just as God if you allow his holiness to dwell in you.

content.header: The glorious power of God dwells in you - 1Corin.3:17.
list: Holiness brings down God’s glorious power to dwell in you if you abide in God’s holiness.

title: KINGDOM HOLINESS MANNER
memoryVerse: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience-2Tim.3:10
meaning: The Characters, ways or behaviour of a person in the Kingdom of God. The way he lives, do things and render services to God and man

body.header: THE COMPONENTS OF HOLINESS (INGREDIENTS OF HOLINESS)

content.header: The fruit of the spirit resides in you – Gal.5:22-23
The holy fire of God resides in you – Jn.5:35
list: The burning and the shining light of God dwells in you through holiness

content.header: The water of life dwells in you – Jn.4:14
list: The water of life dwells in you forever

content.header: The eternal rock dwells in you –  Corin.10:4
list: The eternal rock is Christ

content.header: Eternal victory dwells in you – 1Jn5:4, 1Corin.15:54-57
list: Holy  people always have eternal victory
Victory over death, victory over the power of the grave, victory over sickness, e.t.c.

content.header: The seven spirit of God resides in you
Perfection resides in you – Job.6:9, Job.1:1, Job.8:20
list: You are complete in him
Holy people are perfect in God – Ps.37:37
All these points we just looked at stay in the house of holiness, dwell and reside in the tabernacle of holiness.

title: KINGDOM HOLINESS MANNER
memoryVerse: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience-2Tim.3:10
meaning: The Characters, ways or behaviour of a person in the Kingdom of God. The way he lives, do things and render services to God and man

body.header: THE BLESSINGS OF HOLINESS

content.header: Holiness separates you from sin – Levit.20-24
Holiness removes every obstacle from  dwelling in God’s presence Matt.5:8
Holiness gives you inheritance and possession in the land and Gods kingdom – Lev.20-24
God answers the prayer of a holy man – Ps.17-1
list: The right is the heart that is upright and pure and holy.

content.header: Deliverance from every corruption of the spirit, soul and body Ps.16:10
Holiness is a shield against being harmed – Ps.105:15
list: Holiness delivers you from the negative arrow, expectations and decree of the devil

content.header: Holiness makes you to see (things to come, things done in the past) – Matt.5:8, Is.6:1-3
Holiness makes you hear clearly from God

title: KINGDOM HOLINESS MANNER
memoryVerse: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience-2Tim.3:10
meaning: The Characters, ways or behaviour of a person in the Kingdom of God. The way he lives, do things and render services to God and man
conclusion: Holiness is not negotiable if we shall see God and enter into the holy place of God, which is Heaven

body.header: SOME OF THE THINGS THAT DESTROYS HOLINESS – Heb.12: 14-17

content.header: Root of bitterness defiles – Heb.12:15
Fornication – Heb.12:16
Stubbornness – Heb.12:17
list: Not willing to repent from your evil or wicked way is stubbornness.

content.header: Disobedience – Acts 26:19, 2Tim.3:2, Titus.1:6
Unrighteous ways, thoughts and imaginations – Jer.4:14
Evil communication corrupts holiness – 1Corin.15:33, Matt.5:37

title: REVISION AND GENERAL QUESTION AND ANSWER IN RESPECT OF ALL THE TOPICS COVERED IN THIS MANUAL FROM JULY– SEPTEMBER 2023.
COMPLAIN AND COME PLAIN
memoryVerse: And the boys grew: and Esau was a cunning hunter, a man of the field; and Jacob was a plain man, dwelling in tents. Gen.25: 27
meaning: Complain is expression of unhappiness, grief, discontent, pain and unsatisfaction about a situation
meaning_list: Meaning of Come Plain: is to come to  God pure and clean without complain but with testimony of how you have made your mountain of problem plain by the power, anointing and the grace of God that He has given to you.  It also means to remove, clear, destroy and overcome the mountain and obstacle before you.
note: 1. God did not give to his children the spirit of complain
2. God did not give to his children anointing to complain
3. God did not give to his children the grace to complain
- What God gave to His children is the grace and anointing to overcome and come out plain with testimony – 2Corin.12:7-9
4. When a child of God is full of complain, he removes himself from the atmosphere and the presence of God to the atmosphere and presence of Satan the devil
5. When a child of God is full of complain, he transfers himself from the grace and the will of God to the region and atmosphere of devil and evil spirit. Num.11:1-2

content.header: God is not pleased when his children are complaining, Example is Jonah – who complained against God’s will and assignments, for that reason God transferred him to the belly of the fish to experience the true complain, There he learnt a lesson never to complain and plead for forgiveness. – Jonah 1:3, 17. 2:1-4, 10.

title: COMPLAIN AND COME PLAIN
memoryVerse: And the boys grew: and Esau was a cunning hunter, a man of the field; and Jacob was a plain man, dwelling in tents. Gen.25: 27
meaning: Complain is expression of unhappiness, grief, discontent, pain and unsatisfaction about a situation
meaning_list: Meaning of Come Plain: is to come to  God pure and clean without complain but with testimony of how you have made your mountain of problem plain by the power, anointing and the grace of God that He has given to you.  It also means to remove, clear, destroy and overcome the mountain and obstacle before you.

body.header: ATTITUDES AND CLASSES OF COMPLAINERS

content.header: They despise God – Pro.1:7
They murmur against God and his anointed servant – Num.14:27, Ex.16:8, 1Corin.10:10
They criticize God’s will and actions- Jonah.4:1-3
They grumble against God - 2Corin.9:7, Levit.19:18
They accuse God – Mk.2:3, Matt.12:10
They refuse to use their weapon of warfare to move the mountain before them – Num.13:31
They doubt God and his servant – Mk.11:23
list: They doubt the words of God and the teachings of his servant

content.header: They find fault – Ps.59:4, Dan.6:4

title: COMPLAIN AND COME PLAIN
memoryVerse: And the boys grew: and Esau was a cunning hunter, a man of the field; and Jacob was a plain man, dwelling in tents. Gen.25: 27
meaning: Complain is expression of unhappiness, grief, discontent, pain and unsatisfaction about a situation
meaning_list: Meaning of Come Plain: is to come to  God pure and clean without complain but with testimony of how you have made your mountain of problem plain by the power, anointing and the grace of God that He has given to you.  It also means to remove, clear, destroy and overcome the mountain and obstacle before you.

body.header: ATTITUDES AND CLASSES OF COMPLAINERS (Continuation)

content.header: They cannot move mountain of problem or obstacle – Mk.11:23
They fear and run from mountain. Num.13:31-33
Complainers are converted from godliness to ungodliness – Rom.1:18
Complainers regularly feed from Satan’s evil news –Num.13:32-33, Num.14:1-3
list: Satan feed complainers with evil news and report to make the complainer remain as a complainer all the time

content.header: Disobedient – 1Sam.15:22
list: Any time devil makes you to disobey God is to slay your faith and accuse you before God- Rev.12:10

content.header: Compromise

title: COMPLAIN AND COME PLAIN
memoryVerse: And the boys grew: and Esau was a cunning hunter, a man of the field; and Jacob was a plain man, dwelling in tents. Gen.25: 27
meaning: Complain is expression of unhappiness, grief, discontent, pain and unsatisfaction about a situation
meaning_list: Meaning of Come Plain: is to come to  God pure and clean without complain but with testimony of how you have made your mountain of problem plain by the power, anointing and the grace of God that He has given to you.  It also means to remove, clear, destroy and overcome the mountain and obstacle before you.

body.header: ATTITUDES AND CLASSES OF THOSE THAT COME PLAIN

content.header: They are overcomers – 1Jn.5:4
list: They overcome every mountain and problem that come their way through the word of God.

content.header: They are mountain movers – Mk.11:23
list: They make their mountain plain

content.header: Complainers are converted from godliness to ungodliness – Rom.1:18
They always have a testimony to share: of how they use the power of God and faith to make their mountain plain - 1Sam.17:32-36
They declare their victory in Christ even before it manifest- Mk.11:23, Luke 13:32
list: They always say, speak out their victory with faith without doubting.

content.header: They see mountains and obstacles as testimonies and blessings. – Jn.11:14
list: They see obstacle as a way of glorifying God

content.header: They see mountains and obstacles through their thought as bread before them
They are not complainers, murmurers, accusers or grumblers at the word of God –Ps.119:140
They are solution providers and counselors to others because of their experience and spiritual ability – e.g. Joseph
list: These are the positive character, God wants us to display and maintain.

title: COMPLAIN AND COME PLAIN
memoryVerse: And the boys grew: and Esau was a cunning hunter, a man of the field; and Jacob was a plain man, dwelling in tents. Gen.25: 27
meaning: Complain is expression of unhappiness, grief, discontent, pain and unsatisfaction about a situation
meaning_list: Meaning of Come Plain: is to come to  God pure and clean without complain but with testimony of how you have made your mountain of problem plain by the power, anointing and the grace of God that He has given to you.  It also means to remove, clear, destroy and overcome the mountain and obstacle before you.

body.header: THE SECRET OF THOSE THAT COME PLAIN

content.header: They know that there is a mountain in their life
list: Before you can move mountain you must acknowledge there is a mountain first before making the mountain plain. – Zech.4:7

content.header: They know how to wait upon the Lord for renewal of strength – Ps.91:1, Ps.27:13-14
list: You wait upon God to know the right weapon to use to make your mountain plain

content.header: They don’t doubt the word of God – Mk 11:23
They always make use of their weapon of warfare – 2Corin.10:4
They are victory operators of faithful sons of God
They regularly feed from God’s word –Josh.1:8
They grow in faith – 2Corin.8:7
They grow in hope

title: COMPLAIN AND COME PLAIN
memoryVerse: And the boys grew: and Esau was a cunning hunter, a man of the field; and Jacob was a plain man, dwelling in tents. Gen.25: 27
meaning: Complain is expression of unhappiness, grief, discontent, pain and unsatisfaction about a situation
meaning_list: Meaning of Come Plain: is to come to  God pure and clean without complain but with testimony of how you have made your mountain of problem plain by the power, anointing and the grace of God that He has given to you.  It also means to remove, clear, destroy and overcome the mountain and obstacle before you.

body.header: THE SECRET OF THOSE THAT COME PLAIN (Continuation)

content.header: They grow in knowledge 2Corin.8:7
They grow in wisdom – Luke 2:40
They grow in understanding
They are users of God’s power, anointing and grace – Zech.4:7

body.header: KEYNOTE

content.header: Negative thoughts are great mountains.
When a negative thought is allowed to stay without removing it and make it plain, it will become a great mountain
These negative thoughts are not from God but from the devil and his demons
Positive thoughts are from God and his children - Jer.29:11. God’s thoughts toward us are good thoughts and not evil thoughts
Devil and his agents are the sponsors of evil thoughts and imaginations.
God warned us to be careful of the thought we allow to dwell in us- Matt.6:2

title: COMPLAIN AND COME PLAIN
memoryVerse: And the boys grew: and Esau was a cunning hunter, a man of the field; and Jacob was a plain man, dwelling in tents. Gen.25: 27
meaning: Complain is expression of unhappiness, grief, discontent, pain and unsatisfaction about a situation.
meaning_list: Meaning of Come Plain: is to come to  God pure and clean without complain but with testimony of how you have made your mountain of problem plain by the power, anointing and the grace of God that He has given to you.  It also means to remove, clear, destroy and overcome the mountain and obstacle before you.
note: 1. God did not give to his children the spirit of complain
2. God did not give to his children anointing to complain
3. God did not give to his children the grace to complain
- What God gave to His children is the grace and anointing to overcome and come out plain with testimony – 2Corin.12:7-9
4. When a child of God is full of complain, he removes himself from the atmosphere and the presence of God to the atmosphere and presence of Satan the devil
5. When a child of God is full of complain, he transfers himself from the grace and the will of God to the region and atmosphere of devil and evil spirit. Num.11:1-2

body.header: KEY NOTE (CONTINUATION)

content.header: Take no thought because the thought you take can make or mar you.

God said take no thought, does not mean that we should not think because God himself thinks – Jer.29:11, but the thought God is referring to is the devilish thought that can destroy you, remove you from God’s presence and become Satan’s workman.
What God wants us to think is solution to obstacles  and mountains
When evil thought is magnified, it grows into image and from image it becomes imagination (image of self-nation).
Thought takes people through a long journey, from a little dot of thought then move to become imagination and move into a mountain and then into a great mountain – Gen.6:5
As a child of God be careful of the thoughts and imagination you are using to create your world and words.

Your present state is the product of your thoughts and imaginations, E.g. poverty is a product of thoughts and imaginations which you continue to visualize, manufacture and produce to supply more negative materials.
Evil thoughts and imaginations are weapons; they are satanic weapons to destabilize believers.

title: COMPLAIN AND COME PLAIN
memoryVerse: And the boys grew: and Esau was a cunning hunter, a man of the field; and Jacob was a plain man, dwelling in tents. Gen.25: 27
meaning: Complain is expression of unhappiness, grief, discontent, pain and unsatisfaction about a situation.
meaning_list: Meaning of Come Plain: is to come to  God pure and clean without complain but with testimony of how you have made your mountain of problem plain by the power, anointing and the grace of God that He has given to you.  It also means to remove, clear, destroy and overcome the mountain and obstacle before you.
note: When the enemy gives you a dream about your life, or what is about to happen to you soon, when you wake up from the dream, you need to prayerfully reject and remove it from the way.

Devil cannot do anything in your life except he first get your approval and your signature, if the devil send a dream of poverty to you that you are poor e.t.c. and you wake-up from the dream without prayerfully rejecting that dream that means you have approved the plan of the devil to carry on his plan. By that action of not opposing the enemies plan the devil has just succeeded in making the person to sign his signature on that dream Dream is a reporter that reports to you the evil plan of the enemies and the good plan of God. God has given us weapons of warfare to evacuate Satan’s negative dreams, plans, thoughts and imaginations.

body.header: 2Corin.10:4-5 – We are manufacturers of thoughts and imaginations.

content.header: God gave us power to form thoughts and imaginations e.g. positive thought and imaginations.
Thoughts and imaginations are weapons of warfare to fight against the devil. To overcome the devil, you can’t do it with carnal or fleshly weapon or wisdom.
To overcome the devil you have to abandon your carnal and fleshly wisdom and go deep into God -Jer.29:11
list: Go deep into God’s thoughts.
Go deep into God’s imagination.
1. Go deep into God’s prophecy.

content.header: If devil sends his thought to you and you allow it to stay without evacuating it, it will become part of you and it will be assumed as your thought.
list: The thought will begin to claim ownership of the house if the owner of the house refuses to evacuate the satanic thought.
The person will begin to refer to the devils thought as his own thought even though the thoughts are not his thoughts. – Pro.23:7

content.header: The kind of thought you think will either make you or mar you.
list: What you are now is a result of your past thought and imagination which was your thought-plan – Pro.23:7
The goal you set with your thoughts  is what you shall become
Nobody achieves any goal unexpectedly without thought-plan which you have imagined and worked towards.

content.header: Your present state is the product of your thoughts and imaginations, E.g. poverty is a product of thoughts and imaginations which you continue to visualize, manufacture and produce to supply more negative materials.
Evil thoughts and imaginations are weapons; they are satanic weapons to destabilize believers.

title: COMPLAIN AND COME PLAIN
memoryVerse: And the boys grew: and Esau was a cunning hunter, a man of the field; and Jacob was a plain man, dwelling in tents. Gen.25: 27
meaning: Complain is expression of unhappiness, grief, discontent, pain and unsatisfaction about a situation
meaning_list: Meaning of Come Plain: is to come to  God pure and clean without complain but with testimony of how you have made your mountain of problem plain by the power, anointing and the grace of God that He has given to you.  It also means to remove, clear, destroy and overcome the mountain and obstacle before you.

content.header: 2Corin 10: 4-5
list: God has given us the power to reduce and evacuate thoughts from our heart.
For God to dwell in the thoughts of our heart He (God) wants us to first remove the satanic evil thought from our heart and mind and become pure before he will dwell in our heart -Matt 5:8

body.header: How to evacuate thoughts and imaginations - Matt.11:23

content.header: Through the word of God – Ps 107:20
list: Constantly dwell in God’s word and meditating on it.

content.header: Power of saying and confessing the word of God – Mk.11:23
list: Continue to say it until it become part of you
You can actually stop evil thought through the power of faith

content.header: Be born of God – 1Jn.5:4, Eph.6:17
list: You must be born again to defeat Satan and his evil thoughts and imagination

content.header: The blood of Jesus – Rev.12:11, 1Pet.1:19, Rev.7: 14
list: You must be born again to defeat Satan and his evil thoughts and imagination

content.header: The words of your testimony – Rev.12:11, Eph.6: 15
list: Words of your testimony is the evidence of your proof
Word of your testimony is the evidence of your believe
Word of your testimony is the proof of your occupancy
This is your confession to God and to the world about Christ

content.header: Prayer – Eph.6:18a, Matt.17:21

body.header: What thoughts and imaginations does?

content.header: Evil thoughts reduces your power – Jer.14:14
list: It reduces you before your enemies
It reduces your effectiveness and grace

content.header: Negative thoughts will unnerve you
list: It will bring discouragement to you –Pro.13:12

content.header: Negative thought will unsettle you – James 1:8
list: They are double minded, their mind is not stable –James 4:8

content.header: Negative thoughts are heavy burden on you – Ps.38:4
Evil thoughts change your visage
list: Thoughts can actually change the countenance of how you look beautiful, lively and joyous to begin to look ugly and pale – Gen.4:5

content.header: Evil thoughts can fade away the shining light on you to become deem - 1Thes.5:19 – thoughts quenches the light of the spirit.
list: At this time the person can no more shine as light – Jn.5:35

content.header: Negative thoughts are mountains to make you to find fault with your maker –Num.14:244

body.header: The purpose of mountains

content.header: To make you not to see clearly – Heb.12:2
list: For you not to be able to see the good things God has prepared and set for you now and in the future – 1Corin.2:9

content.header: To make you not to think or reason well -e.g. the prodigal son
To possess you
To oppress you –Ps.17:9
To upset you
To suppress you
To make you go into depression

body.header: Purpose of worries or trouble – Matt.6:6:25-34

content.header: Worrying is not a solution to troubles or issues that weigh down
Worries  makes one senseless
list: make somebody to act senselessly

content.header: Worries attract negative wind
When a child of God gives himself to worries, it opens door for evil news
list: Evil news begin to come from those who are connected to you, because you are a coverage to those around you, e.g. family, friends, neigbours etc.

content.header: Worries make a person to wither – Ps.1:1-4
It makes one to be in between two opinion – 1kings 18:21
list: the person cannot make or take right decision

title: COMPLAIN AND COME PLAIN
memoryVerse: And the boys grew: and Esau was a cunning hunter, a man of the field; and Jacob was a plain man, dwelling in tents. Gen.25: 27
meaning: Complain is expression of unhappiness, grief, discontent, pain and unsatisfaction about a situation
meaning_list: Meaning of Come Plain: is to come to  God pure and clean without complain but with testimony of how you have made your mountain of problem plain by the power, anointing and the grace of God that He has given to you.  It also means to remove, clear, destroy and overcome the mountain and obstacle before you.
conclusion: Mountain of complain are not created in a day but when you allow that little negative thought to remain in you without evacuating it, after a while it will become stronger and grow from the little thought to become great and very great mountain of thought. Before they become great mountain, you need to evacuate and destroy them. It is complain that gives birth to worries, grumblings, accusations, fault findings and rebellion. The earlier you deal with the situation and come out plain, you will remain in the class of complainers. The weapons of our warfare are not canal but mighty through God in bringing down all the negative thoughts and imaginations against us.  As we do, victory is sure in Jesus Name.  Amen.

body.header: WHAT GOD WANTS US TO THINK ABOUT - Phil.4:8-9

content.header: The things that are true – Matt.22:16
list: Whatever comes from God is true because God himself is true
God’s counsel is true
God’s word is true
Holy spirit of God is the spirit of truth – Jn.16:13
God’s prophecies and promises are true

content.header: The things that are honest – Act 6:3
list: That means things that are moral, upright, reasonable and decent.
Think about these things

content.header: Things that are just: Gen.18:19
list: What is just is what is righteous, holy and what agrees with justice
God is pleased when we think on these things

content.header: Things that are pure – 1Tim.4: 12, Matt.5:8
list: Before God will dwell in you, you must first evacuate the negative thoughts and imaginations always in your heart and mind to make it pure for God to dwell in you.
When your heart is pure then you can see God in His words, counsel, and what you do.

content.header: Things that are lovely – 2Sam.1:23
list: Things that are beautiful, delightful, perfect, nice and well pleasing to God and fellow men.

content.header: Things that are of good report: - Act 6:3
list: Good report is profitable to men

There is good and bad report, there is evil and good report; God wants us to think about the good report from God’s words, and God’s spirit, and not to think about the evil and the bad report from the devil and his agent
Any report your dream is bringing to you that is not good,  reject it and evacuate it out of your spirit
Any good report your dream is bringing to you, claim and accept it, decree it to come into reality.
Any evil and bad thought that the enemy is sending to you as your thought, reject it and evacuate it out or your heart. Only accept the God thought from God – Jer.29:11

content.header: Without holiness no man can see God neither fellowship with him because God is a holy God and in Him there is no ungodliness, He expects us his children to be holy as He is.
list: Brethren it is possible to be holy, perfect and complete in God Matt.5:48- if it is not possible God will not even want us to try to be perfect, because it will be a waste of time.

content.header: Gen 17:1-God told Abraham to walk in holiness and become perfect in it, God is not a man that lies; if perfection is not possible God will not and never ask him to walk and become perfect.

title: REVISION AND GENERAL QUESTION AND ANSWER IN RESPECT OF ALL THE TOPICS COVERED IN THIS MANUAL FROM JULY– SEPTEMBER 2023.
